I don't think mental health is really even the issue. Plenty of people have mental illnesses and are still capable of living normal lives. I believe it's the events that happen in a person's life that pushes them over the edge. It could happen to any person. Lets say someone is going through a child custody crisis and one parent is not letting the other see their child. It could be enough to make the parent being neglected get a gun and kill the other. Or maybe someone is feeling treated unfairly at work. They could snap and kill all the people were they work.

You all wanna compare both books, buy them and read them for yourselves. Sure beats what anyone else will tell you on the Internet. Honestly, I'm a Christian but want nothing but peace for everyone. We can all coexist, but we are all too stubborn in our own ways. So go get yourself a Bible and a Quran and read up. You will find that in most religions the first testament is the foundation for them. I encourage all of you to educate YOURSELVES and learn from the positive values it will teach. I don't care who your are what color, race, religion, gender, etc. I'll will give you each the individual respect humans deserve, only the actions you take on me or what you do to others will change that. You only live once people, love it well, and live it happily.

Trump and Clinton – Today, in the WSJ, Juan Williams (FOX News) did an op-ed piece suggesting that Obama will be fully involved in the Clinton campaign for the presidency. This is very good news for Trump supporters as I view Obama as the Republicans secret weapon. I have no doubt that Obama will not leave office without kicking and screaming. I see him doing everything he possibly can to inflict is radical ultra-liberal anti-American agenda on the American public whether we like it or not. Unfortunately he may succeed on many fronts as the spineless Republican Party will be nowhere to be found. Obama actions will push lots of independents and Democrats into Trumps camp. In fact I think Trumps support in these two groups is much higher than is generally reported.
